**As a** [Role]
 **I need** [Function]
 **So that** [Benefit]
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [Document What u Know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [some event happen]
 Then [it shows expected behavior]
 ```
